text: Speed limits in Portugal depend on the both the type of road and vehicle: {| class="wikitable" |- ! !! Built-up areas !! Motorways !! Expressways !! Other roads |- ! Cars and motorcycles | 50 || 120 || 100 || 90 |- ! Commercial vehicles | 50 || 110 || 90 || 80 |- ! Buses | 50 || 100 || 90 || 80 |- ! Trucks | 50 || 90 || 80 || 80 |} When using a trailer the limits are as follows: {| class="wikitable" |- ! !! Built-up areas !! Motorways !! Expressways !! Other roads |- ! Cars and motorcycles | 50 || 100 || 80 || 70 |- ! Commercial vehicles | 50 || 90 || 80 || 70 |- ! Buses | 50 || 90 || 90 || 70 |- ! Trucks | 40 || 80 || 70 || 70 |} ==See also== * List of highways in Portugal ==References== Category:Road transport in Portugal Portugal
title: Speed limits in Portugal
